DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Tobacco Smoking Each of Seven Consecutive Days Indicator Yes No Refused Or Don't Know Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._Used to refer to every member of a group of people or things, considered individually._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied._A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one._In regular succession without gaps._A unit of measurement of time equal to 24 hours._The Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, refused or don't know answer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Tobacco Smoking Each of Seven Consecutive Days Indicator
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._Used to refer to every member of a group of people or things, considered individually._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied._A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one._In regular succession without gaps._A unit of measurement of time equal to 24 hours.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredName: Tobacco Smoking Each Seven Consecutive Day Indicator
Property.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:Used to refer to every member of a group of people or things, considered individually.:A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.:In regular succession without gaps.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
Used to refer to every member of a group of people or things, considered individually.
A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Refused Or Don't Know Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, refused or don't know answer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

Concepts.definition: The answer is not known by the person answering.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Since [the end of the grace p
ReferenceDocuments.description: Since [the end of the grace period] have you ever smoked at least a part of a cigarette on each of 7 consecutive days?
